bUseGridLoadingRange: If True, streaming source shape radius is bound to loading range radius.
LoadingRangeScale: Applies a scale to the grid's loading range (used if bUseGridLoadingRange is True).
Radius: Custom streaming source shape radius (not used if bUseGridLoadingRange is True).
bIsSector: Whether the source shape is a spherical sector instead of a regular sphere source.
SectorAngle: Shape's spherical sector angle in degree (not used if bIsSector is False).
Location: Streaming source shape location (local to streaming source).
Rotation: Streaming source shape rotation (local to streaming source).
